vote.text: Amendment SA 3677 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3677 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S14417; text: CR S14416) To amend the resolution.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3677 proposed by Senator Durbin for Senator Menendez.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3677 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
